ISSUE#98 LikeScreen
As a itinerary creator, I would l like to create an itinerary with tags describing the trip, so that people can filter my trips easily
As a user, I would like to have an app page dedicated to creating new Itineraries
As a user I would like to be able to see my finished itinerary after I am done creating it
As a user, I would like to be able to see the ratings that were given to a path, so that I can better judge the quality of itineraries
As a user, I would like to be able to see a map centered on me when I open the app, so that I can locate myself easier
As a user, I would like to change my profile photo, so that I can have a customise my experience
As I user, I would like to be able to search for an intinerary by pinning points that I would like to pass by, so that i have a planned trip going through places I am interested in
As a user, I would like to record my path and remember them for later on, so that I can choose to follow them at a later time
As a user, I would like to modify my profile with a profile picture and personal features, so that people looking for my itineraries have a better understanding of who I am.
As a user, I would like to see itinerarie clearly drawn on the map with details, in order to have a visual representation
As a user, I would like to see markers of the points of interest of my itinerary, so that I know what locations the itinerary visits and see if it coresponds to my likings
As a itinerary creator, I want to see what ratings were given to me on my trip, so that I can get feedback on the quality of my itinerary so that I know what is good and what I have to improve on
